release.action: Moved all methods of class RITextschluessel to the API class org.jdtaus.banking.Textschluessel and deprecated RITextschluessel.
Attached default Textschlüssel configuration to the artifact and removed it from the artifact's jar file.

Added interface TextschluesselProvider and class ClasspathTextschluesselProvider implementing the former classpath resource lookup mechanism. Updated class XMLTextschluesselVerzeichnis to use any available TextschluesselProvider implementation for reading XML resources.
Added support for monitoring resources with a file URI scheme for changes to support dynamic reloading of changed files.
Removed the name attribute from the <transactionType> XML element and updated the schema to model version 1.1.

Note: All released 1.0 artifacts include a default textschluessel.xml document holding Textschlüssel instances as specified by ZKA. Starting with version 1.1 this document is no longer included in the artifact's jar file.

Note: Starting with version 1.1 the name attribute of the <transactionType> XML element has been removed from the XML schema. It is recommended to update any XML documents by removing that attribute and specifically to also update any XML document's schemaLocation attribute to point to the new 1.1 schema document.
Updated the XML module descriptor to the 1.1 model version.
Added various missing serial version UID fields. Updated to latest mojo releases.

Upgraded to latest core features.
  • removed any internal properties resources and moved any messages to the META-INF/jdtaus/module.xml module descriptor.
